name: AVAudioSession.RouteChangeReason
desc: Constants that indicate the reason for an audio route change.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: A value that indicates the reason for the change is unknown.

items.name: case newDeviceAvailable
items.desc: A value that indicates a user action, such as plugging in a headset, has made a preferred audio route available.

items.name: case oldDeviceUnavailable
items.desc: A value that indicates that the previous audio output path is no longer available.

items.name: case categoryChange
items.desc: A value that indicates that the category of the session object changed.

items.name: case override
items.desc: A value that indicates that the output route was overridden by the app.

items.name: case wakeFromSleep
items.desc: A value that indicates that the route changed when the device woke up from sleep.

items.name: case noSuitableRouteForCategory
items.desc: A value that indicates that the route changed because no suitable route is now available for the specified category.

items.name: case routeConfigurationChange
items.desc: A value that indicates that the configuration for a set of I/O ports has changed.
